name: Bangkok Story: A Stray Dog
storyline:
What could make a man homeless? Is it one's family's financial situation? Is it the government? Is it because of our friends? Or... is it because of oneself?

Explore a journey from his childhood to the present. Unravel what made a man lose everything.
summary: A top-down 2D story-driven adventure game inspired by real-life events. Traverse and experience the life of a formerly homeless man through an interview of how he regained his sense of self by telling his past to a stray dog. Set in Bangkok, Thailand 2017.
